title: The Rational, Irrational, and Elon-Brained Reasons Why SpaceX Acquired xAI
full_text: The Rational, Irrational, and Elon-Brained Reasons Why SpaceX Acquired xAI. You can list a thousand wholly rational reasons as to why this man should not be this wealthy and argue that Tesla stock’s true value is actually $14, but the fact of the matter is that we don’t live in a rational world. We live in the one where Elon Musk is …. Elon Musk is the face of the saying that the market can stay irrational longer than you can stay solvent. An entire army of people have fought in the great war of Tesla shorts and lost, including you… [+11232 chars]
